deadline Deadline with random argument specified /random argument
deadline Deadline with wrong due date format /by due date
deadline Deadline with due date and time /by 01-02-2023 1222
event Event without start and end date
event Event with only start date /from 01-02-2023 1222
event Event with only end date /to 02-02-2023 1222
event Event with wrong start and end date format /from start date /to end date
event Event with both start date and end date /from 01-02-2023 1222 /to 01-03-2023 1222
event Event with start date after end date /from 01-03-2023 1222 /to 01-02-2023 1222
event Event with random argument specified /random argument
